name: Ned Kelly
what_did:
Ned Kelly was a famous outlaw in Australia.
He robbed banks and fought the police.
He wore homemade armor in his final battle and became a legend to some people.
why_matters:
Ned Kelly is one of Australia’s most talked-about figures.
Some see him as a rebel who stood up for the poor.
Others think he broke the law and caused harm.

questions.q: What country was Ned Kelly from?
What did Ned Kelly wear in his final fight?
How do people remember Ned Kelly?
How old was Ned Kelly when he died?

fun_fact: Kelly’s helmet is now on display in a museum!
